Giveaway ends on 9 January 2018 (Tuesday) at 5pm. Terms and conditions apply.

10.post_text:
Turn on your engines with BMW Motorrad at Wicked Wallop on Sat 6 Jan 2018 (3pm -10pm) at Carros Centre, for a powerful convergence of energy and enthusiasm.

Take part in our Ultimate Freedom photo contest that day, where you will stand to win exclusive BMW Motorrad premiums when you post your best shots taken at our display on your Facebook and Instagram! Hashtag #BMWMotorradSGxWW so that we can find you!

Terms and conditions apply.

20.post_text:
It has truly been an amazing year for BMW! We are pleased to announce that the BMW 5 Series has clinched the Car of the Year 2017 and Executive Sedan of the Year awards by sgCarMart, and the BMW 530i M Sport has won the Best Executive Sedan 2017 award by ONESHIFT.

ONESHIFT has also awarded BMW and Performance Motors the Industry TrailBlazer (Special Mention). We would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for your support during this past year.

22.post_text:
Performance Munich Autos is glad to be part of the ‘4D3N Discover Ipoh Drive’ from 9-12 Dec 2017. 

A group of BMW M enthusiasts from BMW M Club made the drive up North to discover Ipoh and explore the twisty B-roads. Highlights of the trip include visiting the Gaharu Tea Valley, Cameron Highlands, and Lost World of Tambun. Click through the photo album to relive the adventure!
